mapper.select: SELECT `articleID`, `title`, `userID`, `state`,`articleGroupID`, `privacy`,`contents`, `regionID`, `unitID`, DATE_FORMAT(postedDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as postedDate, DATE_FORMAT(lastEditedDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as lastEditedDate, DATE_FORMAT(deletedTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as deletedTime FROM article WHERE #{privacy} >= privacy ORDER by postedDate desc limit #{pageNo}, #{size} ;

SELECT `articleID`, `title`, `userID`, `state`,`articleGroupID`, `privacy`,`contents`, `regionID`, `unitID`, DATE_FORMAT(postedDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as postedDate, DATE_FORMAT(lastEditedDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as lastEditedDate, DATE_FORMAT(deletedTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as deletedTime FROM article WHERE (articleGroupID=#{articleGroupID} AND #{privacy} >= privacy AND state = 0) order by postedDate desc limit #{pageNo}, #{size} ;

SELECT `articleID`, `title`, `userID`, `state`,`articleGroupID`, `privacy`,`contents`, `regionID`, `unitID`, DATE_FORMAT(postedDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as postedDate, DATE_FORMAT(lastEditedDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as lastEditedDate, DATE_FORMAT(deletedTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as deletedTime FROM article WHERE articleID = #{articleID};
